Class LowerTriangularMatrix

  • java.lang.Object
    • util.linalg.Matrix
      • util.linalg.LowerTriangularMatrix
  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    public class LowerTriangularMatrix
extends Matrix
    A class representing a lower triangular matrix
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Andrew Guillory gtg008g@mail.gatech.edu
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LowerTriangularMatrix(int m)
      Create a new square zero matrix that is restricted to be lower triangular
      LowerTriangularMatrix(int m, int n)
      Create a new zero matrix that is restricted to be lower triangular
      LowerTriangularMatrix(Matrix m)
      Create a lower triangular matrix containing the lower triangular entries of the given matrix
